messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi there! Actually, I'm the one who needs a little help. I recently moved from Florida to Phoenix, but my address is still showing as the old one in your system. I noticed my current address is on my recent order, but I'd rather not share it out loud here. Could you help me update it? Also, while we're at it, could you tell me the price of the cheapest t-shirt you have right now? And can I order it through you? By the way, I promise I’m funnier than your average customer—ready for some jokes if you need a laugh!
